description:
For summer surfing or paddling, the lined neoprene fabric wicks moisture and allows your skin to breathe. A panelled cut with seam-free zones offers a full range of paddling motion when sitting, standing or lying on your board.

  • Polyester and spandex face fabric is bonded to a 0.5mm petroleum-free neoprene
  • Nylon and polyester lining feels nice against your skin
  • Eco-Stretch neoprene is limestone-based and designed for comfort and warmth
  • UPF 50+ protects you from UV rays
  • Flatlock stitched seams throughout
  • Seamless underarm panel with raglan sleeves for unrestricted movement
  • Connector loop for board shorts
name: Level Six Sombrio Long Sleeve - Women's
